verbs.description: glossarize (third-person singular simple present glossarizes, present participle glossarizing, simple past and past participle glossarized)

entries.meaning: (transitive) To provide (a work) with a glossary.
examples: I was asked to glossarize it and I refused to do so, arguing that by the time someone comes to the end of the novel they'll know what it is about. They'll know the names of the various avatars of Ganesh, for example.
